articles.author: Rohan Nadkarni
articles.title: NBA Christmas Day Takeaways: Giannis States MVP Case, Lakers Frustrate (Again) - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Julius Randle woke up, Golden State showcased its tremendous depth and the Lakers suffered another frustrating loss on an eventful holiday slate.
articles.content:
A few thoughts on some of the Christmas games in the NBA…
Knicks 101, Hawks 87
This game was largely a snoozer, having lost most of its luster once Trae Young entered the health and safety protocol… [+6928 chars]

articles.title: Warriors' depth highlighted in Warriors' big Christmas win - NBC Sports Bay Area
articles.description: Down five players and four coaches, the Warriors got their best win of the season on Christmas Day against the Suns.
articles.content:
PHOENIX -- Steph Curry couldn't help but flash a sly smirk when he was asked if the Warriors' 116-107 win over the Phoenix Suns was their best win of the season. 
He looked down and collected himsel… [+3998 chars]
